scripts.build:amnesiac:all: bun run build:amnesiac:client && bun run build:amnesiac:server
scripts.verify:fisherman: cd apps/fisherman && sh -c 'bun run start & pid=$!; sleep 1; curl -fsS http://localhost:3000/health > /dev/null; status=$?; kill $pid; wait $pid 2>/dev/null; exit $status'
scripts.verify:all: bun run verify:amnesiac:client && bun run verify:amnesiac:server && bun run verify:fisherman
scripts.format:amnesiac: cd apps/amnesiac-client && bun run format && cd ../amnesiac-server && bun run format
scripts.format:amnesiac:fix: cd apps/amnesiac-client && bun run format:fix && cd ../amnesiac-server && bun run format:fix
scripts.lint:amnesiac: cd apps/amnesiac-client && bun run lint && cd ../amnesiac-server && bun run lint
scripts.lint:amnesiac:fix: cd apps/amnesiac-client && bun run lint:fix && cd ../amnesiac-server && bun run lint:fix
scripts.clean: rm -rf apps/*/node_modules apps/*/dist packages/*/node_modules packages/*/dist node_modules
